name: Balancer
description: Balancer is a decentralized automated market maker (AMM) protocol that represents a flexible building block for programmable liquidity.

missions.name: Balancer AVAX LST Chad
missions.description: Create an sAVAX or ggAVAX LP position on Balancer,then stake for BAL rewards.

quests.name: Create LP Position for sAVAX or ggAVAX
quests.description: Create an LP Position on Balancer

tasks.name: Create LP Position
tasks.description: Create an LP Position on any Balancer Pool on Avax

quests.name: Stake sAVAX LP
quests.description: Stake sAVAX/WAVAX LP tokens for rewards on Balancer.  You will have to deposit to acquire LP tokens if you do not already have them.

tasks.name: Stake sAVAX/WAVAX LP
tasks.description: Stake sAVAX/AVAX LP tokens for rewards on Balancer

quests.name: Stake ggAVAX/WAVAX LP
quests.description: Stake ggAVAX/WAVAX LP tokens for rewards on Balancer.  You will have to deposit to acquire LP tokens if you do not already have them.

tasks.name: Stake ggAVAX/WAVAX LP
tasks.description: Stake ggAVAX/AVAX LP tokens for rewards on Balancer
